outline:
1. then, at that time
    1. temporal expressions
      1. then (past)
      2. then, if...then (future)
      3. earlier
    2. logical expressions
      1. in that case
      2. that (being so)
kjv_def: beginning, for, from, hitherto, now, of old, once, since, then, at which time, yet.
strongs_def: at that time or place; also as a conjunction, therefore
